post.desc:
What would be the reverse of Aya's journalism? ðŸ¤” An actual monthly bulletin outlining exactly what has happened with all the sources?

Now, this is where it gets interesting. Aya in canon doesn't publish everything. This is another end of her journalistic integrity. If orders from above come, or the dissemination of a particular information will be detrimental to the tengu, she will withhold the thing.

A reverse of Aya, however, **will** publish it anyway.
